price: Yeroo isaan Gooftaa isaanii fuulduratti dhaabaman odoo argitee (waan rifachiisaa argita ture) "Sila inni kun dhugaa mitii?" jedhe. "Eeyyeen; Gooftaa keenyaan kakannee! dhugaa dha" jedhan. "Waan kafaraa turtaniif (amma) adabicha dhandhamaa!" jedhe.
arabic: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذۡ وُقِفُواْ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡۚ قَالَ أَلَيۡسَ هَٰذَا بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّنَاۚ قَالَ فَذُوقُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡفُرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walaw tarā idh wuqifū ʿalā rabbihim qāla alaysa hādhā bil-ḥaqi qālū balā warabbinā qāla fadhūqū al-ʿadhāba bimā kuntum takfurūna
translations: they will be made to stand
